channel.title: CVE Feed for Amodat -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Amodat -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-23168|2024-08-03T03:36:20.013Z -- amodat -- amodat
item.description: The attacker could get access to the database. The SQL injection is in the username parameter at the login panel: username: admin'--

item.title: CVE-2022-23167|2024-08-03T03:36:20.065Z -- amodat -- amodat
item.description: Attacker crafts a GET request to: /mobile/downloadfile.aspx? Filename =../.. /windows/boot.ini the LFI is UNAUTHENTICATED.

item.title: CVE-2022-23169|2024-08-03T03:36:20.368Z -- amodat -- amodat
item.description: attacker needs to craft a SQL payload. the vulnerable parameter is "agentid" must be authenticated to the admin panel.
